A harness is a helpful dog accessory in ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:15:06 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9.92 x 6.69 x 2.24 inches; 15.2 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ December 20, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ GM PET SUPPLIES
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09NWGW22W

REFLECTIVE STRIPS FOR A SAFER WALK. A harness is a helpful dog accessory in dog training for puppies and guide dogs. The bright reflective strips ensure safe dog walks for both day or night. Go ahead and have a worry-free dog jogging at night!
NO PULL, NO CHOKING FEATURE. Its fully adjustable straps at the neck and chest, allows a custom fit that prevents choking and other injuries for your pet. The no pull harness adjusts and helps you control your dog.
DURABLE EASY-CLIP ON LEASH. This has an easy lift-top handle that allows you to easily put on and off the leash on your pet. Saves time and allows you to have more time for dog walks, dog hikes and dog jogs!
GREAT VALUE AND COMPLETE. You would like to have lightweight, washable and highly dependable dog collars and leashes. This set includes a dog leash, a harness and a dog waste bag dispenser with a carabiner clip, a complete gear for your pet!

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 06:15:06 UTC – Details)

item.title: Best Pet Supplies Crinkle Dog Toy for Small, Medium, and Large Breeds, Cute No Stuffing Duck with Soft Squeaker, Fun for Indoor Puppies and Senior Pups, Plush No Mess Chew and Play
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Give Your Dog an Active Play Outlet with a Soft Crinkle Paper Dog Toy from Best Pet Supplies We all want to give our dogs a healthy way to play, have fun, and enjoy staying active; especially when it comes to giving them toys that are less messy and stand ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $5.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:14 UTC – Details)


Give Your Dog an Active Play Outlet with a Soft Crinkle Paper Dog Toy from Best Pet Supplies We all want to give our dogs a healthy way to play, have fun, and enjoy staying active; especially when it comes to giving them toys that are less messy and stand up to all the biting, chewing, and tugging. That’s why we created these super cute, high-quality Best Pet Supplies Duck-Shaped Dog Toys with built-in squeaker and crinkle paper. These versatile toys for dogs give them multiple ways to play and stay engaged while satisfying their natural behavioral needs. And because there’s no stuffing you don’t have to worry about cleaning up a big mess the moment your dog rips into them. Product Details: Soft Duck Dog Toy Built-In Squeezable Squeaker Crinkle Paper Interior No Stuffing or Fluff Available in 6 Fun Colors Overall Length: 15”
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 15.5 x 7.5 x 1.5 inches; 0.63 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ PT332
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 27, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Best Pet Supplies, LLC
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09BBM5CX8
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Cute and Colorful Duck Shape – Shaped like a real duck these dog crinkle toys for small dogs, medium dogs, and every size in between comes in 6 unique colors and provides a more puppy friendly shape that’s easy to carry around
No Fluff, No Mess Design – Unlike messy bones, ropes, or other toys for aggressive chewers these dog crinkle toys won’t leave behind a mess after they’re done playing. They also boast reinforced fabric and stitching to help them hold up to chewing
Active Play, Tossing, and Retrieving – Our cute duck chew toys for dogs can be used for bonding with your puppy, reducing stress or separation anxiety, or simply giving them an active outlet for channeling aggression or intense play


Read more





Cleaning Made Easy

Need to get that toy cleaned from drools or dirt? Just toss it into the washing machine on gentle cycle and tumble dry on low heat.

Soft, Plush, and Durable

We use higher-quality materials in our dog toys to ensure they hold up to regular chewing, biting, tugging, and pulling. If the squeaker or the paper comes out simply discard them and you can continue to let your dog play with the duck for as long as it’s still chewable.

Audible Play Sounds

The crinkle paper in the body and the squeaker in the head give dogs multiple outlets for stimulating their auditory and physical senses. These distinct sounds will keep them having fun far longer than standard toys, so they can relieve stress, stay focused, and even reduce aggressive behaviors.

Adorable Variety

At 15” in size these colorful ducks are more fun for young puppies and older dogs alike because they feature multiple “chew points” and they’re a better shape for carrying.

Read more



4.5
Price: $5.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:14 UTC – Details)

onlineMonth,

Product Description

You can choose from a variety of colors

There are so many colors, and you can choose one which you like best.

The Soft Seat Belt Shoulder Pads are not just simple and fashion trend but also fully functional and practical in many purposes.

These are not just intend to your car seatbelt, these are also applicable in your sling bag, pack bag, guitar bag sling, golf bag sling, arm chairs and the likes.

This soft seat belt shoulder pad will provide you the most convenient driving experience ever. This is made of high quality , soft and smooth, comfortable feel, It’s not easy to fade, and healthy.

Color: As the picture show

Package included: 2 Pcs Car Seatbelt Shoulder Pad

With the high quality material, the seatbelt pads covers are very soft and warm; making it has the right amount of padding without being too bulky. This adds comfort and makes your driving more relaxing.

It is the best gift for your relatives and friends.

Gives Comfort and Helps Relieve Friction

Soft material

The car seat belt shoulder pads are made of soft materials.

Soft and Comfortable

The high quality seat belt pads are super soft and fit great to the seatbelt, provide lots of comfort.

Easy to Apply with Strong Cloth Sticker

Our shoulder pads are very easy to apply by just a cloth sticker along the length, the sticker is very strong and fits together very snugly and does not snag your clothes, easy stick on and off.

Seat Belt Pads Stay in Place

Velcro holds them in place, they don’t slide down, doesn’t move up & down while you are driving.

Multi-Purpose

The Soft Seat Belt Shoulder Pads are not just simple and fashion trend but also fully functional and practical in many purposes.

These are not just intend to your car seatbelt, also applicable in your sling bag, pack bag, guitar bag sling, golf bag sling, arm chairs and the likes.

Package Content: 2x 1 Pair seat belt shoulder pads
These Shoulder Seatbelt Cushions are great for protecting you while you drive.
It easily installs on all shoulder seatbelts, Each seat belt cover has a piece of durable special cloth sticker on the underside that you simply open, fold over the seat belt and then close again.
This Seat belt pad can be used for car, trunk, jeep, SUV, airplane, can also be used on your handbag, baby diaper bag, golf bag, luggage which has a strap, and anyplace else you want padded comfort.
This gives relaxation with its soft and comfortable feel; this makes your driving experience more at ease. This also encourages the kids to wear their seatbelts.

Gives Comfort and Helps Relieve Friction

Soft material

The car seat belt shoulder pads are made of soft materials.

Soft and Comfortable

The high quality seat belt pads are super soft and fit great to the seatbelt, provide lots of comfort.

Easy to Apply with Strong Cloth Sticker

Our shoulder pads are very easy to apply by just a cloth sticker along the length, the sticker is very strong and fits together very snugly and does not snag your clothes, easy stick on and off.

Seat Belt Pads Stay in Place

Velcro holds them in place, they don’t slide down, doesn’t move up & down while you are driving.

These Shoulder Seatbelt Cushions are great for protecting you while you drive.
It easily installs on all shoulder seatbelts, Each seat belt cover has a piece of durable special cloth sticker on the underside that you simply open, fold over the seat belt and then close again.
This Seat belt pad can be used for car, trunk, jeep, SUV, airplane, can also be used on your handbag, baby diaper bag, golf bag, luggage which has a strap, and anyplace else you want padded comfort.

From the brand

GARTOL Gardening Tools

Not sure how to get your GARTOL product to work correctly?

Contact our friendly support team for quick solutions.

The GARTOL is a 20 years old and professional brand in the United States. Our products are famous for high quality. We are specialized in manufacturing a wide range of garden tools comprising lopper, hedge shears, grass shears, hand pruners, hand saw, cultivator, rake, flower stand, and so on. All the products are sold to many countries and areas, including Europe, the USA, Australia, and East-south Asia.

Please let us know if you are interested.

GARTOL Miter Shears

GARTOL Garden Lopper

Garden Hose Holder

Garden Tool

Pump Sprayer,Plant Caddy

Ladies Sexy Stockings

Pump sprayer, Pruning shears

GARTOL Tools

ANTIRUST SK 5 STEEL BLADE Sharp sturdy blade, ideal for cutting chamfer, round molds, trunking and pvc strips, rubber gaskets, molding and weatherstrip.
HIGH-PRECISION ENGRAVING SCALE Clear and precise scale surface to help you cut accurately. Adjustable slider on the scale surface allows for a 45°-135°cutting angle, free to cut the trunking to different shape when needed.
ERGONOMICALLY DESIGNED HANDLE Strong and durable integrated handle is made of aluminum alloy and PPC anti-skid cover. Comfortable grip no hand fatigue for long-term use.
TURN CLASP SAFETY LOCK The turn clasp closure is easy to close and open, safe and convenient, you no need to worry about being accidentally scratched by the blade.
REPLACEABLE BLADE This trunking scissors set includes additional Spare Sharp heavy duty replaceable blade. Notice this shear is not suitable for cutting metal and stainless steel.

Have you ever had problems measuring your material only to realize it is slightly off and have to redo the entire thing?

If you’ve ever installed small moldings, such as quarter round, you’ll immediately recognize the utility of these miter shears.

GARTOL miter shears are perfect for all your installation needs to save you TIME. Use for cutting time trim, PVC piping, quarter round, tack strip, and other light materials.

Toggle to adjust the angle you want

The basic shear has a jaw with right and left 45° fences, and incised markings for 60°, 75°, 90°, 105°, 120°and 135°. Free to cut the trunking to a different shape when needed.

Don’t waste time measuring and cutting when you can do both at the same time with our Miter Cutters.

Read more

Multi-function angle shears great for cutting chamfer, shoe molding, trunking and wood parts for carpet.

Handy for odd trimming jobs, rubber plastic edge strip, PVC trunking corner, PVC edge strip, semi-circular strip, thin wooden splicing, and so on.

Snipping dowel and rods and all those other tasks too hard for scissors, yet too small for a saw. These multi-angle cutters are great for small daily work activities or even DIY projects.

Works effectively with softwoods up to 3/4″ in size.

Read more

The set includes additional spare sharp, heavy-duty replaceable blade

Our miter cutter has 2 Sk-5 steel blades, non-slip ergonomically designed handle, high-precision engraving scale, clasp safety lock.

  1. Premium stainless steel blade comes ready to take on any job, including cutting PVC, piping, wood trim, wires, or other similar materials without pulling out big materials.
  2. Whether you’re a handy person looking for a new tool or a professional with specific needs, these multi-angle cutters are great for small daily work activities or even DIY projects.
  3. Our tools come with a full steel frame and ergonomic rubber soles that provide great traction and comfort to help the hand when applying pressure on the cutter.
  4. Our pre-attached angled reference saves you a load of time and the hassle of measuring the angle trying to cut. Helps with accuracy and efficiency for your angle measuring needs

Read more

NOT SATISFIED?

If you are not completely happy please get in touch with us before leaving negative feedback. We can’t help you if you don’t let us know for assistance.

Please let us know via your Amazon order or our Amazon store. Enjoy GARTOL’s 1-year after-sales policy.

Thank you!

Press Once: answer the call / play / pause
Long Press: Refused/ End the call
Press Twice: Next Song
Press Thrice: Previous Song
